channel.title: Reminder: Use the Search Feature
channel.description:
[u][b]Using The Search Feature[/b][/u]
On most forums, Including this one, there is a feature called "Search" shown at the top of forum it may look something like this [img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/filter.gif[/img], It can be found under the "download MoparScape Link. this will be set out as a step by step, To remove the need to ask stupid and pointless messages.
1. Type what you would like to look for in the search bar. As you can see I have typed in "Server Restarters" (shown in red). [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/34imnm1.jpg[/img]
2.Press the "Enter Button" Or Click Search.[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/168eoar.jpg[/img]
3.You will be shown many search results, i will now show you how to understand the screen you will be shown. [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2rw6gjd.jpg[/img]
-[b]Subject[/b]-[i] This is what you are looking for, click on the link for more information[/i] -[b]Relevance[/b]- [i]This is how much the topic "matches" what you typed in.[/i] -[b]Started by[/b]- [i]This is who started the topic[/i] -[b]Date Posted[/b]- [i]This shows the time and date the topic was posted,[b] if a topic is many months old please do not post spam into it as this is considered "gravedigging"[/i][/b]
4.After clicking what you have looked for, you should now be at the original thread of the topic. so you should see this [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/5znm2f.jpg[/img] - And the server restarter you was looking for.

item.title: Reminder: Use the Search Feature
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

Using The Search Feature

On most forums, Including this one, there is a feature called “Search” shown at the top of forum it may look something like this , It can be found under the "download MoparScape Link.
this will be set out as a step by step, To remove the need to ask stupid and pointless messages.

  1. Type what you would like to look for in the search bar. As you can see I have typed in “Server Restarters” (shown in red).

2.Press the “Enter Button” Or Click Search.

3.You will be shown many search results, i will now show you how to understand the screen you will be shown.

2rw6gjd.jpg1118×150

-Subject- This is what you are looking for, click on the link for more information
-Relevance- This is how much the topic “matches” what you typed in.
-Started by- This is who started the topic
-Date Posted- This shows the time and date the topic was posted,[b] if a topic is many months old please do not post spam into it as this is considered “gravedigging”[/b]

4.After clicking what you have looked for, you should now be at the original thread of the topic. so you should see this
- And the server restarter you was looking for.

Read full topic
